org.apache.webapp.balancer
Class RequestHeaderRule

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.webapp.balancer.BaseRule
      org.apache.webapp.balancer.RequestHeaderRule
All Implemented Interfaces:
Rule
public class RequestHeaderRule
extends BaseRule

This rule checks for the presence of a specific request header, optionally with a specific value. The value may be null.

Author:
Yoav Shapira
